mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, b.hit, u.name, b.user_no as userNo, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, b.order_no as orderNo, b.depth, b.group_no as groupNo from user u, board b where b.user_no=u.no order by group_no DESC, order_no asc limit #{startPage}, #{onePageCount}

select b.no, b.title, b.hit, u.name, b.user_no as userNo, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') as regDate, b.order_no as orderNo, b.depth, b.group_no as groupNo from user u, board b where b.user_no=u.no like '%${text or contents or userName}%' order by group_no DESC, order_no asc limit #{startPage}, #{onePageCount}
